roleset.note: DENOTE-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from denote.01-v)

example.name: transitive, arg0 and arg1
example.text: Below these particulars was [*T*-2] a series of alpha-beta-gammas connected[*]by arrows and crosses which [*T*-1] denoted the lineage of the breed .
